title: Flask of Venom
summaries: The Flask of Venom is a Hardmode, post-Plantera flask that imbues melee and whip attacks with the Acid Venom debuff for 20 minutes / 15 minutes. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, this effect will not be lost when the player dies.
The effect currently doesn't affect players in <linked>PvP</linked> scenarios. The debuff lasts for 5–9 seconds

statistics.Tooltip: Melee and Whip attacks inflict Acid Venom on enemies
